component.name: Intuos BT M
component.summary: Firmware for the Wacom Intuos BT M Tablet

description.p: Wacom Intuos helps you find new ways to create. Designed for those who are drawing, painting and photo editing with their Mac or PC for the first time, the Wacom Intuos is easy to setup and use.

The Wacom Intuos gives you all the tools you need to enhance your creativity. Its versatility and ease-of-use means you can customize Wacom Intuos to fit your own way of working. Whether you love to draw manga art, paint digital watercolors or retouch your photos, you can tailor the pen tablet to suit your style, your way.
This is the initial hardware release, and is only available on the LVFS to test downgrading. Normal users do not need to apply this firmware update.
